      • cancelDeliveryRequest

        @RequestMapping(value="/user_cancelDeliveryRequest",
                method=GET)
public void cancelDeliveryRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> model,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Cancel delivery request.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        request - the request
        response - This method calls cancelDeliveryRequest method of the service and sets requestId as a parameter.

      • returnBookRequest

        @RequestMapping(value="/user_returnBookRequest",
                method=GET)
public void returnBookRequest(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> model,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                    javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Return book request.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        request - the request
        response - This method calls returnBookRequest method of the service and sets requestId as a parameter when the Button clicked was Return Book. Else if the BUtton clicked was Cancel Return Request the cancelReturnRequest method of the service was called with parameter as Request Id.
